description: Volkner`s Electivire was the first Pok√©mon he sent out to battle Ash for his Gym badge. It was matched up against Ash`s Torterra which it was able to defeat after taking an early beating. It then had to face Ash`s Pikachu but Pikachu`s Iron Tail proved to be too much for it and was defeated.
name: Elekible (Denji)
